ygData.authorName: The weather is here, wish you were beaut
ygData.from: "The weather is here, wish you were beautiful" <douglas@...
ygData.subject: Re: Testament of Vanear
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, don t worry too much; they ve taken out the corrupt Qeynos Guard you need to kill, and Moodoro Finharn doesn t give the Jester card anymore ...
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 14 Sep 1999 Gizmo115@... wrote:

> Well.. i know with today's patch this is now an item that you can put in your
> left hand slot, and yeilds +10 mana and +10 wisdom.. a necessity for any
> cleric... but its also lore and no drop... and I am a DE cleric... I know the
> quest starts in Erudin and also takes place in i think qeynos and HH, but
> does anyone know a way in which i might be able to obtain this valuable item?
> Especially since DE clerics get zero quests... and casters get that stein
> thing that isn't no drop... i guess i'll have to yell at some GMs for that
> one.... anyone who can give a more detailed spoiler or a way to increase
> faction with only the npcs who are abosolutly necessary for the quest would
> be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance for the info.

Actually, don't worry too much; they've taken out the corrupt Qeynos
Guard you need to kill, and Moodoro Finharn doesn't give the Jester card
anymore ... he gives the faction, he talks as if he's given you a card,
but there's no card given.

Dammit. ANd I HAD a testament, but destroyed it since they made it
NoDrop while it was in the bank and once I took it back into my
possession, I couldn't put it back.

--
"I would not mind you in my head," Lews Therin said, sounding almost
sane, "if you were not so clearly mad."
